animeDescription: A tranquil forest and all of its residents must face the destruction of man. A squirrel, born and raised in the forrest, fights to defend his home and faces trials and adversities along the way.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Tezuka Osamu', ['Director']], ['Kawajiri Yoshiaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Kurahashi Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']], ['Suzuki Shinichi', ['Key Animation']]]
